messages.startup: {#server}*** Aseco/Rasp started on TmSiaB v4{#server} - Mistral Mod.***
messages.welcome: {#welcome}Hello {1}{#welcome}, welcome to TmSiaB v4 {#welcome}!{br}{#highlite}Users: {2}; Records: {3}; Tracks {4}{br}{#welcome}$nIf you can afford it, please donate some coppers for the lottery, so new players can benefit.
messages.record_new: {#server}>> {#record}You secured your {#highlite}{1}{#record}. place with a time of {#highlite}{2}{#record}!
messages.record_first: {#server}>> {#highlite}{1}{#record} took the {#highlite}{3}{#record}. World Record with a time of {#highlite}{2}{#record}!
messages.record_current: {#server}>> {#message}Current record on {#highlite}{1}{#message} is {#highlite}{2}{#message} and held by {#highlite}{3}
messages.record_error: {#server}>> {#error}Could not get records from database... No records this round!
messages.ranking_none: {#server}>> {#message}Record rankings after this round: no records!
